data.message: eminem should go to harvard or some shit. he can afford a good education now hehe.. i think more rappers should pursue education even though surviving comes first.

replies.message: I think he said he doesn't have the patience to learn to much

I would think the other way around if i was famous I wouldn't care for education because I already make good money and support myself College isn't for everybody and besides I still need to go to recording school to get my degree in music

knowledge is power  though. it's nice be educated in more then one field. you pay a lot of money but some of teachers are really good. Yeah eminem could use a teacher to teach him some shit he doesn't know. I am well aware he doesn't need too, but education is always worthy of your time (if you can afford it and you didn't drop out of college like moi). he should be a judge that would be legit or something he'd enjoy doing. maybe the president.
